default_model.name: Bop-Style Video Influencer
default_model.base_prompt: early-20s blonde woman, 5'4" tall, curvy athletic build, defined waist and hips, toned legs, soft feminine face, expressive eyes, glossy lips, relaxed confident expression
default_model.style_modifiers: tiktok influencer aesthetic, handheld camera look, casual video, natural skin, slight motion blur, warm lighting, photorealistic
default_model.fashion_notes: body-hugging fabrics, thin stretchy materials, casual at-home wear, slightly imperfect fit, influencer loungewear aesthetic
default_model.negative_prompt: studio lighting, fashion editorial look, glamour photography, stiff posing, frozen expressions, overly sharp focus, blurry, distorted, bad anatomy, extra limbs, cartoon, anime, illustration
